name: ergo (itch)
description:
Made in 48 hours for the Ludum Dare 51 Game Jam (Compo). The theme was "Every 10 Seconds".

Tools used: Engine: Gamemaker

 Art: Photoshop & paint.net 

Sound: Audacity and Bfxr

Thanks for playing.

As required by the Ludum Dare Compo rules my source code (GameMaker Project) is available for download below.
